attributes.action: Increase the pay of NHS staff and Key Workers who earn less than £30k by 10%
attributes.additional_details:
These people have saved the country, they work on the frontline for minimal pay which has in effect gone down over the last ten years. 

Applauding them will not pay their bills or buy them food, they should be rewarded now and in the future.
attributes.background: Increase the pay of NHS staff (including contracted out staff such as cleaners) and Key Workers who earn less than £30k by 10% by raising income tax by 1%

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for setting the pay of all keyworkers, which includes many people who are privately employed.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Provide a Pay increase of 7% to all our NHS workers fighting COVID19
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568373

Reverse the disgraceful decision to yet again freeze public sector pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561208

Increase local authority funding to pay for increase in pay for social workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571609
